name: WikiwordS
short_description:
WikiwordS is designed to craft wordlists by extracting words from wikipedia articles. The length of the words to store can be manipulated  in order to fit your needs. 
WikiwordS also has a spider plugin which extracts links from requested articles in order to use them for the wordlist, too. This feature is still experimental, you might download about 200 to 300 and more articles with the spider enabled. 

NOTE: 
Due to WikiwordS is still an early alpha there are some features which are disabled temporarily. Additionally the wordlist will contain a lot of duplicates which have to be removed with other tools.
summary: WikiwordS crafts wordlists from Wikipedia articles
